content.text:
# A Choice of Coward

A Choice of Coward is a British television anthology series.  NoÃ«l Coward served as host, introducing productions of his plays, Blithe Spirit, Design for Living, The Vortex, and Present Laughter.
The series was part of the Itelevision play of the Week anthology series that ran from 1955 to 1967.
Produced by Granada Television, it premiered in August 1964 and ran one season.
